name: Arctic Escape (itch)
description:
In Arctic Escape you play as a penguin trying to reach a liferaft to evacuate a collapsing iceberg. Each step the penguin takes causes the ice behind it melt away. Every step you take causes the ice (adjacent to the water) in the opposite direction to break. You must navigate around the map to reach the goal while regarding how the map will shift with each step.

This was made for LudumDare 42
